original_text: About this we have much to say, and it is hard to explain, since you have become dull of hearing.
korean_text: 멜기세덱에 관하여는 우리가 할 말이 많으나 너희가 듣는 것이 둔하므로 설명하기 어려우니라

sentences.original_text: About this we have much to say
sentences.korean_translation: 이것에 대하여는 우리가 말할 것이 많습니다

sentences.original_text: and it is hard to explain
since you have become dull of hearing.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너희가 듣는 데 둔해졌기 때문입니다
